medical_history.chief_complaint: Breathlessness and intermittent fever for more than 20 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in February 2022 and persisted for over 20 days. The patient also had a history of epistaxis episodes and sporadic bleeding over the past 40 years, mainly exacerbated by exertion or stress.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Brain abscesses and video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery for pulmonary neoplasm six months prior to the current admission, with a histopathological diagnosis of hemangioma.
medical_history.family_history: One of her sisters and her young daughter both suffered from nasal hemorrhage.
